title: Aisyx
description: Book #5 in the Neuripra Series - A metaphysical romance by PoppetAisyx falls hopelessly in love with his vesna goddess only to have betrayal ruin her innocence and drive a wedge of hurt between them which love can't dissolve. Their cover has been blown, the humans are hunting the supernaturals, and Zauran and Sveta have been captured by the military.Jowendrhan finally meets the Life made for him, a slakax rescues their men, the demons reveal their subterfuge, and despite much tribulation Aisyx manages to marry his woodland goddess. When the Casting fathers get the call to return, Dravid meets someone he's drawn to - a lost soul he's come to save, Seth disciplines Venix, and Selene finally exposes the truth.In this comprehensive culmination unity is wrought, Seithe comes back to save his brother's soul.
author: Poppet
